<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Terror Shrike](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1335)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The terror shrike, also known as the scythe beak, is a more powerful species of terror bird. Large terror bird flocks typically have one or two terror shrikes as leaders.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Terror Shrike](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1335)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 264</row>

**Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +13 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+5 piercing plus tearing clutch

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 piercing plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)

**Sprint** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** The terror bird Strides three times in a straight line.

**Stunning Screech** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The terror shrike unleashes a haunting screech that causes prey to freeze in fear. Each creature in a 30-foot emanation other than terror birds must attempt a DC 19 Will save. Regardless of the result, creatures are then temporarily immune for 1 minute. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected. **Success** The creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of its turn. **Failure** The creature is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). **Critical Failure** The creature is stunned 2.

**Sudden Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The terror shrike Strides twice. If it ends its movement within melee reach of one creature, it can make a melee Strike against that creature.

**Tearing Clutch**   The terror bird's powerful beak can tear through flesh. On a successful beak Strike, the target takes 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). This bleed damage increases to 1d8 on a critical hit.

</column>
